languages.text: "Ты не сможешь выполнить обещание, данное мандрагорам. Не боишься мести?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты не сможешь выполнить обещание, данное мандрагорам. Не боишься мести?"

languages.text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не сможешь выполнить обещание, данное мандрагорам. Не боишься мести?"

traits.locale_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"
"You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"
"You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"
"You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

languages.text: «Hiciste una promesa a las Mandrágoras que no estás en posición de cumplir. ¿No te preocupan las represalias?».
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: «Hiciste una promesa a las Mandrágoras que no estás en posición de cumplir. ¿No te preocupan las represalias?».

languages.text: “你对那些曼德拉许下了无法兑现的诺言，你就不怕他们报复你吗？”
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: “你对那些曼德拉许下了无法兑现的诺言，你就不怕他们报复你吗？”

languages.text: 「お前はマンドレイクに守れない約束をしたな。報復が怖くないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前はマンドレイクに守れない約束をしたな。報復が怖くないのか？」

languages.text: « La promesse que vous avez faite aux Mandragores est intenable. Vous ne craignez pas d'éventuelles représailles ? »
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: « La promesse que vous avez faite aux Mandragores est intenable. Vous ne craignez pas d'éventuelles représailles ? »

languages.text: "Ihr habt den Mandraks etwas versprochen, was Ihr nicht einhalten könnt. Habt Ihr keine Angst vor Vergeltung?"
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt den Mandraks etwas versprochen, was Ihr nicht einhalten könnt. Habt Ihr keine Angst vor Vergeltung?"

languages.text: "Kankurutanlara tutamayacağın bir söz vermişsin. Hesabını sormazlar mı?"
languages.original_text: "You made a promise to the Mandrakes that you cannot keep. Aren't you afraid of retribution?"

traits.locale_text: "Kankurutanlara tutamayacağın bir söz vermişsin. Hesabını sormazlar mı?"
